title: TISC is fine-tuning AI for split-second decisions, starting on the basketball court

title: POWERGRID HR Tech event spotlights AI–human balance
description: The POWERGRID HR Tech Conference 2025, held in partnership with SHRM, opened with addresses from national leaders, industry experts and global HR professionals, outlining themes around humane leadership, digital transformation and technology-supported workforce practices. POWERGRID underlined the need to reduce the perceived separation between humans and technology, encouraging organisations to adopt “humane leadership” as AI [...]

title: Amazon to invest $50 billion in AI cloud for the U.S. government
description: The massive AWS expansion comes weeks after a major outage and amid a growing federal push for secure AI capacity.

title: Google Is Getting the AI Spotlight, But Nvidia Says Its GPUs Are a ‘Generation Ahead.’ How Should You Play NVDA Stock Here?
description: Nvidia stock inches up as Jensen Huang confirms its GPUs are a generation ahead of Google’s custom AI chips. Here’s what that means for NVDA shares.

title: No AI is conscious yet, but future systems may be, new study finds
description: The question of whether AIs are conscious is becoming more important, and a team of researchers has tried to answer it. Consciousness is notoriously difficult to research: How can we determine whether it feels like something to be an AI? Researchers, therefore, start with easier questions — like,...
